meanings.definition: Composed of individuals gathered in a group or company.
meanings.sent1: The compony team worked together to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The compony office celebrated their success with a party.
meanings.sent3: The compony picnic was filled with laughter and fun.
meanings.sent4: The compony of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The compony choir sang harmoniously at the concert.

meanings.definition: Having a pattern of small figures closely set together.
meanings.sent1: The compony design on the fabric was intricate.
meanings.sent2: The compony wallpaper added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The compony arrangement of flowers was eye-catching.
meanings.sent4: The compony rows of trees created a mesmerizing view.
meanings.sent5: The compony dots on the dress formed a lovely pattern.
